sentences.sContent: There are strict guidelines that must be followed if someone dies intestate – in other words without a will.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are strict guidelines that must be followed if someone dies intestate – in other words without a will.
sentences.sCn: 未立遗嘱死亡的情况有严格的指导方针，换句话说，如果未立遗嘱。

sentences.sContent: The second deals with intestate succession i. e. the mode of distribution prescribed by law in default of any provision made by the deceased.
sentences.sContent_eng: The second deals with intestate succession i. e. the mode of distribution prescribed by law in default of any provision made by the deceased.
sentences.sCn: 即在死者没有对财产分配作出任何决定的情况下，根据法律规定的来分配遗产的方式。

remMethod.val: in(无) + test(看到) + ate → 没有留下可以看的东西 → 未留遗嘱的

trans.tranCn: 没有立下遗嘱的, 不能根据遗嘱处分的
trans.tranOther: to die without having made a will(= a statement about who you want to have your property after you die )
